content.question: The ideas in the excerpt most directly intensified which of the following domestic developments in the 1950s?

choices.label: Calls for the elimination of racial discrimination
Rejection of many established cultural values by the younger generation
Allegations of communist infiltration of the government

content.answer: Allegations of communist infiltration of the government

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
